Docs.summary: Initiates the recommendation generation or computation process for a subscription. This operation is asynchronous. Docs.summary: Retrieves the list of snoozed or dismissed suppressions for a subscription. The snoozed or dismissed attribute of a recommendation is referred to as a suppression. Request Path: /subscriptions/{subscriptionId}/providers/Microsoft.Advisor/suppressions Operation Id: Suppressions_List
Docs.returns: A collection of that may take multiple service requests to iterate over.
